title: Gmail Conversation View
content:
Gmail on Pixel 2 is not turning off conversation view even though the setting is turned off.  

I've called Pixel Help, but they only work with Hardware Issues.

Backstory: On Wednesday Gmail stopped syncing on my Pixel.  I did a system up last night and also stopped GMail on the phone and restarted it. After about an hour, the account began syncing again, but the settings were all screwed up.  I reset my settings, but Gmail isn't playing nicely.

Any help is appreciated.
